notes: Adjustments to this recommended course sequence might be required based on course scheduling or if you have been admitted with advanced standing.

Registration to the Honours Thesis in Psychology requires the following prerequisites: 81 university units including PSY1101, PSY1102, PSY2106, PSY2116, PSY2174, PSY3307. PSY3307 can be a corequisite to PSY42761 and PSY42762. A CGPA of at least 8.0 is required and no exceptions will be approved.

Winter: PSY2110 | Research Methods in Psychology I
PSY2116 | Research Methods in Psychology II

Fall: PSY3307 | Advanced Research Methods and Data Analysis
PSY42761 | Honours Thesis or 1 optional PSY course at 4000-level
Winter: PSY42762 | Honours Thesis or 1 optional PSY course at 4000-level
PSY4130 | History and Systems of Psychology
